medium: Tempera on parchment mounted on BO board
title: Entombment of Christ
marks: Signature and Date bottom center, in black: [F. Ruppert. pinx. Norib
description: body of Christ carried on a cloth by two men, with a third man supporting Christ\'s torso; man in doorway to tomb, LLC, with a kneeling praying woman (Mary Magdalene?), who wears pink and purple; Mary accompanied by two other figures (woman and angel?) in URQ; three crosses on hill in distance with two men with ladders visible; instruments of the Passion in LRC
